## Detailed outline

1.  W1: Intro to course and RStudio.

2.  W2: Intro to R and RxP data.

3.  W3: R Markdwon.

4.  W4: Number Distributions.

5.  W5: Summary Statistics.

6.  W6: Comparing two means.

7.  W7: Comparing multiple means.

8.  W8: Tidy Data.

9.  W9: Linear Regression.

10. W10: ANCOVA - combining ANOVA and Linear Regression.

11. W11: Generalized Linear Models - When your response is non-normal.

12. W12: Hierarchical Models.

13. Project: Find a dataset.

14. Project: Summarize your data.

15. Project: Analyze your data.

16. Final: Submit full analysis.
